articles.title: Girl nearly drowns during Sunday swim at Siloso Beach - AsiaOne
articles.description: What was meant to be a pleasant weekend swim almost turned into a nightmare when a young girl nearly drowned in the waters off Sentosa's Siloso Beach on Dec 26 evening. The young girl was swimming at Siloso Beach when she was drowning in the sea for a short w…
articles.content:

articles.title: Colombian director Jaime Osorio Marquez, 'A Thousand Fangs' creator, dies at 46 - The Star Online
articles.description: He chose to die by assisted suicide on Dec 23 in Colombia, where euthanasia is legal.
articles.content: Colombian director Jaime Osorio Marquez, who served as creator and director on HBO Max's first Colombian series, A Thousand Fangs (Mil Colmillos), chose to die by assisted suicide on Thursday (Dec 23… [+2962 chars]
